mapper.sql: platform_id, order_code, process_status, amount, create_date, update_date
mapper.insert: insert into payment_trans_detail ( platform_id, order_code, process_status, amount, create_date, update_date ) values ( #{platformId, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{orderCode, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{processStatus, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{amount, jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{createDate, jdbcType=DATE}, #{updateDate, jdbcType=DATE} )
mapper.select: select platform_id, order_code, process_status, amount, create_date, update_date from payment_trans_detail where platform_id = #{ platformId, jdbcType=VARCHAR } and order_code = #{ orderCode, jdbcType=VARCHAR }
